## Objective The goal was not only create a good user experience for informational website, but to structure the whole ecosystem including payments, memberships, custom admin dashboards etc. ## About Client
Ace Battle Association is a special running events organizer. Despite the fact, that companyâ€™s main product is offline events, their need in high quality software is essential.
## Challenge Ace Battle Association was very specific client, since it is a new organization, without any previous IT projects implemented. Throughout a year working for this companies we changed multiple projects and still updating existed. ## Functionality ### Memberships The task were to build a user friendly membership based user roles. The roles are: > - Visitor (Base role) > - Runner > - Coach > - Manager Each role has different access to different pages. There are a connectivity between roles ### Notification System
Of course the app suggests at least basic notification system. Users get notifications from different users, system. They may also get notification to their phones. > Expo gives opportunity to easily build and test notification System. While socket io make sure everything being updated when using the app.

document.title: The main platform for Ace Battle Association

body.raw:
## Objective The goal was not only create a good user experience for informational website, but to structure the whole ecosystem including payments, memberships, custom admin dashboards etc. ## About Client
Ace Battle Association is a special running events organizer. Despite the fact, that companyâ€™s main product is offline events, their need in high quality software is essential.
## Challenge Ace Battle Association was very specific client, since it is a new organization, without any previous IT projects implemented. Throughout a year working for this companies we changed multiple projects and still updating existed. The main features is catigorized in three groups: Informational platform Members portal Event landing pages and registrations The platform includes results monitoring, runner profiles and portal, news, articles, rules explanation as a informational platform. There is a memberships in organization which includes possibility to find a team, register and participate in events, multiple roles as subscription plans etc. The ogranization is able to announce competition, the landing page appears on the website. They can control the accessibility and registrations for events. ## Tools & Technologies

UX/UI:

Figma, Adobe photoshop

Frontend:

TypeScript, NextJs, RemixJs, Redux, React Query, MUI, Tailwind.

Backend:

NodeJs, NestJs, MySql

Services:

Google Cloud Services, Stripe, Vercel
## More Photos

document.title: AHMO chat Web and Mobile Platforms

body.raw:
## About the Project

Ahmo chat is a final group project to graduate from HackYourFuture.
It was 6 weeks journey, full of challenges and interesting moments while working in a group.

<MdxImage
  src="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fahmo-chat.png"
  width={800}
  height={500}
  className="mx-auto mt-5 mb-4"
/>

What we have build is a gaming chat web application

body.raw:
<ProjectsIntro />

<Callout>

This is a seletion of my last projects and works. You can find even more projects on my [github](https://github.com/podnesTaF)

</Callout>

## Projects

### Work and Personal projects

<CardContainer>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-web"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fevent-preview.png"
  title="The main platform for Ace Battle Association"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nestjs"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-mobile"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fmobile-preview.png"
  title="Ace Battle Events Mobile Platform"
  tags="typescript,react,mobile,reactnative,expo,nestjs"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-web"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fahmo-chat.png"
  title="AHMO Chat Platforms"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nestjs"
/>

</CardContainer>

### Projects in progress

These what I'm working with on my spare time:

<CardContainer>

<Card
  href="/projects/cfit-factory"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fcfit-factory.png"
  title="CFit Factory. CFit Factory - Cross-fit programs and execution. Mobile application"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nextjs,reactnative,mobile"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/feature-craft-js"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Ffcjs.png"
  title="Feature Craft Js - open source js advanced features library."
  tags="nextjs,library,features,nestjs"
/>

</CardContainer>

### Univerity Works

<CardContainer>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-web"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fevent-preview.png"
  title="The main platform for Ace Battle Association"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nextjs"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-mobile"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fmeminder.png"
  title="Meminder - web reminder app. Group work."
  tags="typescript,react,mobile,reactnative,expo,"
/>

</CardContainer>
